config.email: enter email for the full_name value
config.distro: The distro on this machine or virtual machine
config.userName: The name of the account for the user
config.dataDirectory: enter the directory to store data files
config.homeDirectory: enter the home directory of the user
config.linuxConfiguration_directory: enter the linux configuration data top directory ex. /home/git/cstockman/linuxConfiguration
config.textEditor: enter your favorite editor ( absolute path ) ex. /bin/vi

github.personalAccessToken: A token generated from Github Settings/Personal Access Tokens

config.wireless_ssid: (Service Set Identifieri) -- The primary name associated with an 802.11 wireless local area network
daemons: enter your daemons on each line

backupMachine.remote_user: remote user that will login to the remote ip
backupMachine.remote_password: remote password that wil login to the remote ip
backup_directories: An array of remote directories where the user will store files

config.defaultCconsole: The Default GUI Terminal ( ex. konsole -e /bin/bash )
